Curriculum Vitae - Nick Javes
Personal Information
Full name:		Nicholas Robert Javes
Resides:		63 Cowslip Crescent, Thatcham, Berkshire, RG18 4BY, UK.
Date of Birth:		16th July, 1968
Status:			Married
Nationality:		British (English)
Personal Summary
A successful, positive, conscientious and ambitious individual with a competitive edge. I enjoy working with people on many levels – building relationships and meeting new people. I have a proven track record, over 23 years, in selling security solutions, products and services across most verticals including energy (utilities, oil & gas), service providers, finance, insurance, enterprise, gaming, services, manufacturing and pharmaceuticals.

Personal Information
Full name:		Nicholas Robert Javes
Resides:		63 Cowslip Crescent, Thatcham, Berkshire, RG18 4BY, UK.
Date of Birth:		16th July, 1968
Status:			Married
Nationality:		British (English)
Personal Summary
A successful, positive, conscientious and ambitious individual with a competitive edge. I enjoy working with people on many levels – building relationships and meeting new people. I have a proven track record, over 23 years, in selling security solutions, products and services across most verticals including energy (utilities, oil & gas), service providers, finance, insurance, enterprise, gaming, services, manufacturing and pharmaceuticals.
I enjoy most sports and keeping fit. I regularly play touch rugby, 5-a-side football, golf and enjoy cycling and going to the gym. Skiing when possible!
Personal Motivations
My primary motivation is to succeed financially. I relish a challenge and enjoy being successful. To achieve this it is crucial to continually improve my skills and identify ways to progress my career. Job satisfaction is an important factor as is a career path. Ultimately I see myself in a sales management position having now built up many years of valuable and varied experience, however my primary passion is selling and helping customers with solutions that add value to and help to protect their businesses.
Career History
Zscaler - January 2016 – December 2020
Regional Sales Manager UK&I, Large Enterprise
My role is ‘Direct Touch’ and focusses on selling into ‘new logo’ large enterprise (10,000-65,000 users) named accounts. Then managing and upselling to existing accounts (UK&I based headquarters but accounts most accounts are global).
Zscaler operates a 100% channel model, working mainly with the largest Internet Service Providers and Managed Security Services Partners including Verizon, BT, AT&T, Vodafone, T-Systems and VARs including Computacenter, Atos etc.
Success is achieved by directly targeting and engaging end-users. Developing strong relationships with key end-user stakeholders at all levels. Also, working jointly with partners to build transformation propositions that include Zscaler’s cloud-based security solutions.
Key Achievements:
FY2019		177%
FY2018		238%
Key Awards include:
RSM UK&I Award for Q1 FY17 (Aug-Oct) Building Pipeline
EMEA RSM Award for Q1 FY18 (Aug-Oct) 310% achievement
EMEA Gold Standard Award Winner 2018 (plus 7,500 RSUs issued for outstanding contributions)
Global RSM of the QTR for Q4 FY19 (May-July) 257% achievement
EMEA RSM for FY19 177% achievement
Significant wins include:
Global Oil & Gas			$6.5M, 65,000-100,000 users, 3 years
Global Utility				$1M, 15,000 users (UK), 3 years
Global Engineering Services		$1.5M, 14,500 users, 3 years
Global Tobacco Mananufacturer	$1.5M, 41,000 users, 3 year
Global Food & Beverages		$450K, 25,000 users, 1 year
Publishing & Information Services	$690K, 8,500 users, 3 years
Leading Construction  			$650K 15,000 users, 3 years
UK Utility				$154K, 6,000 users, 1 year
Global Designer Retail			$630K, 10,000 users, 3 years
Arbor Networks
March 2013 – January 2016
Enterprise Sales Manager UK&I
New role to build and develop pipeline for Arbor’s Enterprise product range (new), and build/re-build channel relationships – Arbor has changed from a direct-sales model to 100% channel organisation (for fulfillment). Direct selling involvement in 100% of deals.
Very successfully built strong, proactive relationships with key UK&I security partners including BT, NTT Com Security (Integralis), SecureData, Nebulas, Phoenix, Agile Networks, Brookcourt and have contacts in many more. I built a very healthy new business Enterprise pipeline with large enterprises in banking, finance, insurance, pharmaceutical and e-commerce.
Significant Enterprise wins included:
VISA Europe			$1M			EBRD				$190K
Prudential (PGDS)		$430K			Trader Media			$260K
Booking.Com (Priceline)	$330K			Rightmove			$120K
Bank of America		$310K			Colt (internal)			$300K
GSK				$285K			Baillie Gifford			$120K
Foreign & Commonwealth	$100K
HP – ESS - March 2011 – March 2013
Client Engagement Director (New Logo Business & Major Accounts)
Highlights New Logo W

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
